answers.answer: hi - you really need a thorough evaluation.  try looking in your local phone book to see if you have a free or low-cost clinic.  you can also contact your local hospital to see if they have any suggestions.  also, hospitals and clinics which do x-rays and scans will give you a significant discount for paying cash.  our local hospital gives a 70% discount for cash payment.  they will also be willing to put you on a payment plan if you can't work out anything else.  good luck!

IF YOU HAVE HIT YOUR HEAD FROM TRAUMA IT IS WORHT THE MONEY TO FIND OUT WHAT IT COULD BE IT IS POSSIBLE YOU HAVE NERVE DAMAGE IN THE CERVICAL AREA OF YOUR NECK. IT COULD BE ALSO MAYBE YOU ARE EXPERIENCING SEIZURES WHILE YOU ARE HAVING HEADACHES THERE ARE MANY TYPES OF SEIZURES GOOGLE THE WORD SEIZURES AND SEE IF YOUR SYPTOMS COMPARE WITH THOSE.  GOOD LUCK

question: I am 21 years old and I am an athlete. I have been suffering from headaches since I was in the ninth grade in high school. There was a time in a basketball game where I fell out of the air, head first, onto the court and then there was this other time that I went up for a shot in a game and was knocked out of the air, again, head first. I wasn't unconscious but it did hurt for a few days. Every since then I have been having headaches. I'm not sure if that really had an effect on me though. Up until this day,after any sport or activity, I get painful, painful headaches. I wake up every morning with headaches. I even had one this morning. Sometimes they last all day and sometimes just half the day. I event forget what I am talking about sometimes. There are a few other things that I have noticed over the years but I know I don't have time to discuss everything. I don't think that Migraines or anything run in my family. I know that diabetes and cancer does. I also have a trait of sickle cell. I know that it's not that serious but I just thought that I would inform you of that just in case that plays a part in it. Also, I have weighed only 107 pounds or less for the past4 or 5 years. I have difficulty gaining weight. I have been trying to get to the doctor to do some x-rays on my head for a while now but I can't really afford it. I hope and pray that someone with experience will receive this and is able to help me and advise me on what should be done. I worry everyday if I am going to wake up the next day b/c I don't know how serious this is.I will appreciate any help. Thanks
title: Terrible Headaches for many years
